m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Swap-O-Matic (Cool.) May 29th, 2012 by Zachary Shahan     OK, one more repost from another one of our many great sister sites this morning. This one is maybe not world-changing, but it is pretty darn cool. It’s a “Swap-O-Matic” machine that helps you to swap/trade goods rather than buy them. I could definitely see this taking off. But it looks like the project needs a bit more funding to hit its June 17 deadline — hopefully some of you can pitch in! You can learn more on the Kickstarter page linked above or in this repost from Ecopreneurist : Crowdfunding Platf
